name: Generators (PixiePal)
description:
Press any key to start
WASD - Move
Space: Shoot
Hold shoot to control bullet

You are a fresh cadet tasked with delivering a critical message to the Emperor, but you are intercepted by the fearsome ship of legends IT who traps you in its force field. Now you must dodge and weave between enemy missiles while destroying their generators in this 2D shoot ‘em up/action game where you are fighting for survival in every frame.

Red pellet: Antishield

Blue pellet: Speed (3 seconds)

Every  15 seconds without shooting a generator, the border closes in

Don't get hit for 20 seconds and gain an extra life!
